body:
Comment 3: 
OK, it seems to me that the best reasonable output would be something you don't seem to
say, namely:

prog.go:4: undefined: a
prog.go:4: array index must be non-negative integer constant
prog.go:4: cannot use true (type bool) as type int in array element
prog.go:4: cannot use true (type bool) as type int in array element
prog.go:4: cannot use true (type bool) as type int in array element

Would you agree?
